definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="world_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Tastes like radiation poisioning.</field></block></value><next><block type="deal_damage"><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1024</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="damagesource"><block type="damagesource_from_type"><field name="damagetype">GENERIC</field></block></value><next><block type="explode"><field name="mode">TNT</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="power"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">25</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
